author: Potlimitcrypto
body: Hello, never heard of Kaspium so let's try keep this Sub discussion to Kendu.  If you go to Kendu.io there are instructions for buying Kendu on three chains! Recommended is Eth if buying with size.  You will also find a list of CEXes on the site if you'd prefer.

author: Expert-Detective-525
body: You can buy Kendu on:  🔸MEXC: [https://www.mexc.com/exchange/KENDU\_USDT](https://www.mexc.com/exchange/KENDU_USDT)  🔸BingX: [https://bingx.com/en/spot/KENDUUSDT/](https://bingx.com/en/spot/KENDUUSDT/)  🔸LBank: [https://www.lbank.com/trade/kendu\_usdt](https://www.lbank.com/trade/kendu_usdt)  🔸Bitmart: [https://www.bitmart.com/trade/en-US?symbol=KENDU\_USDT](https://www.bitmart.com/trade/en-US?symbol=KENDU_USDT)  🔸SuperEx: [https://www.superex.com/trade/KENDU\_USDT](https://www.superex.com/trade/KENDU_USDT)  🔸FameEX: [https://www.fameex.com/en-US/trade/kendu-usdt](https://www.fameex.com/en-US/trade/kendu-usdt)  🔸Poloniex: [https://poloniex.com/trade/KENDU\_USDT/](https://poloniex.com/trade/KENDU_USDT/)  🔸GroveX: [https://www.grovex.io/en\_US/trade/KENDU\_USDT](https://www.grovex.io/en_US/trade/KENDU_USDT)  🔸Bilaxy: [https://bilaxy.com/trade/KENDU\_ETH](https://bilaxy.com/trade/KENDU_ETH)  🔸CoinEx: [https://www.coinex.com/en/info/KENDU](https://www.coinex.com/en/info/KENDU)  🔸BigONE: [https://big.one/en/trade/KENDU-USDT](https://big.one/en/trade/KENDU-USDT)  🔸Biconomy: [https://biconomy.com/exchange/KENDU\_USDT](https://biconomy.com/exchange/KENDU_USDT)  🔸ProBit: [https://www.probit.com/app/exchange/KENDU-USDT](https://www.probit.com/app/exchange/KENDU-USDT)  🔸Azbit: [https://azbit.com/exchange/KENDU\_USDT](https://azbit.com/exchange/KENDU_USDT)     I personally just use Uniswap, if you use it make sure the CA is correct    ETH: 0xaa95f26e30001251fb905d264Aa7b00eE9dF6C18  SOL: 2nnrviYJRLcf2bXAxpKTRXzccoDbwaP4vzuGUG75Jo45  BASE: 0xef73611F98DA6E57e0776317957af61B59E09Ed7  IDK what Kaspium is ngl

author: RegardedQt314
body: it is a good idea to always search tokens using contract addresses as opposed to just the name because of the risk of copycat tokens.   Kendu's native token is built on Ethereum but we are wormholed to Solana and Base too so we have 3 different contract addresses and you'll just need to keep that in mind when purchasing depending on what chain you want to use.   here are the contract addresses for each chain:   ETH: 0xaa95f26e30001251fb905d264Aa7b00eE9dF6C18  SOL: 2nnrviYJRLcf2bXAxpKTRXzccoDbwaP4vzuGUG75Jo45  BASE: 0xef73611F98DA6E57e0776317957af61B59E09Ed7  it is also recommended to verify contract addresses through official channels like our telegram or verified X account.  edit: also do not reply to dms about this post because 99.9% of the time it is someone trying to scam you.
